scripts.watch: nodemon -w src -w assets -w index.html -e css,html,js --ignore assets/slimmed-bootstrap.css --ignore script.js -x npm run build
scripts.build: npx purgecss --css assets/bootstrap.min.css --content index.html 'src/**/*.js' 'assets/**/*.js' --output assets/slimmed-bootstrap.css && npx esbuild src/main.js --bundle --minify --outfile=script.js
